option.name: originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="#0D0F20" tools:context=".JadwalSpidermanActivity">
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:paddingBottom="24dp">
<!-- Header Section --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/iv_back" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="16dp" android:contentDescription="@string/back_button" android:src="@drawable/ic_arrow_back" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:tint="@android:color/white" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_header_title" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_bold" android:text="BELI TIKET JADWAL OFF" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="18sp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@id/iv_back" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@id/iv_back" />
<!-- Movie Info Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/cv_movie_info" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="16dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#1A1D2E" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="0dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/iv_back">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp">
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="80dp" android:layout_height="120dp" app:cardCornerRadius="8dp" app:cardElevation="0dp">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/iv_movie_poster" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:contentDescription="@string/movie_poster" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:src="@drawable/poster_spiderman" /> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_movie_title" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_bold" android:text="SPIDERMAN FAR FROM HOME" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="16sp" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:orientation="horizontal">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_regular" android:text="Usia" android:textColor="#9CA3AF" android:textSize="10sp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:background="@drawable/rating_background" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:paddingStart="8dp" android:paddingTop="2dp" android:paddingEnd="8dp" android:paddingBottom="2dp" android:text="R 13+" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="10sp" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:orientation="horizontal">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_regular" android:text="Rating" android:textColor="#9CA3AF" android:textSize="10sp" />
<ImageView android:layout_width="12dp" android:layout_height="12dp" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:contentDescription="@string/star_rating" android:src="@drawable/logo_bintang" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="4dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="9.5" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="10sp" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:orientation="horizontal">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_regular" android:text="Durasi" android:textColor="#9CA3AF" android:textSize="10sp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="2 Jam 9 Menit" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="10sp" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
<ImageView android:id="@+id/iv_watchlist" android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical" android:contentDescription="Watchlist" android:src="@drawable/ic_heart" app:tint="#7700FF" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Sinopsis Section --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tv_sinopsis_label" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_bold" android:text="SINOPSIS" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="14sp" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/cv_movie_info" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_sinopsis_jadwal" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="JADWAL" android:textColor="#7700FF" android:textSize="14sp" app:layout_constraintBaseline_toBaselineOf="@id/tv_sinopsis_label" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- CGV XXI CIREBON Section --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/ll_cgv_header" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:background="#1A1D2E" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="12dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/tv_sinopsis_label">
<ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical" android:contentDescription="Location" android:src="@drawable/ic_map_pin" app:tint="#7700FF" />
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="CGV XXI CIREBON" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="14sp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_regular" android:text="Rp.40.000" android:textColor="#7700FF" android:textSize="12sp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Schedule Grid CGV --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tv_date_cgv" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="Senin,\n18/11" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="12sp" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/ll_cgv_header" />
<GridLayout android:id="@+id/grid_schedule_cgv" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:columnCount="4" android:rowCount="2" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/tv_date_cgv" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@id/tv_date_cgv">
<!-- Row 1 --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_cgv_1245" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_columnWeight="1" android:layout_margin="4dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="12:45" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="12sp" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:strokeColor="#7700FF" app:strokeWidth="1dp" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_cgv_1430" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_columnWeight="1" android:layout_margin="4dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="14:30" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="12sp" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:strokeColor="#7700FF" app:strokeWidth="1dp" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_cgv_1615" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_columnWeight="1" android:layout_margin="4dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="16:15" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="12sp" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:strokeColor="#7700FF" app:strokeWidth="1dp" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_cgv_1800" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_columnWeight="1" android:layout_margin="4dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="18:00" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="12sp" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:strokeColor="#7700FF" app:strokeWidth="1dp" />
<!-- Row 2 --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_cgv_1945" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_columnWeight="1" android:layout_margin="4dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="19:45" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="12sp" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:strokeColor="#7700FF" app:strokeWidth="1dp" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_cgv_2030" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_columnWeight="1" android:layout_margin="4dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="20:30" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="12sp" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:strokeColor="#7700FF" app:strokeWidth="1dp" /> </GridLayout>
<!-- TRANSMART CIREBON CGV Section --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/ll_transmart_header" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:background="#1A1D2E" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="12dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/grid_schedule_cgv">
<ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical" android:contentDescription="Location" android:src="@drawable/ic_map_pin" app:tint="#7700FF" />
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="TRANSMART CIREBON CGV" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="14sp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_regular" android:text="Rp.45.000" android:textColor="#7700FF" android:textSize="12sp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Additional Info Transmart --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tv_regular_2d" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="REGULER 2D-23L" android:textColor="#7700FF" android:textSize="12sp" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/ll_transmart_header" />
<!-- Schedule Grid Transmart --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tv_date_transmart" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="Senin,\n18/11" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="12sp" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/tv_regular_2d" />
<GridLayout android:id="@+id/grid_schedule_transmart" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:columnCount="4" android:rowCount="2" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/tv_date_transmart" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@id/tv_date_transmart">
<!-- Row 1 --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_transmart_1015" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_columnWeight="1" android:layout_margin="4dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="10:15" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="12sp" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:strokeColor="#7700FF" app:strokeWidth="1dp" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_transmart_1310" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_columnWeight="1" android:layout_margin="4dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="13:10" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="12sp" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:strokeColor="#7700FF" app:strokeWidth="1dp" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_transmart_1505" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_columnWeight="1" android:layout_margin="4dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="15:05" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="12sp" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:strokeColor="#7700FF" app:strokeWidth="1dp" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_transmart_1710" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_columnWeight="1" android:layout_margin="4dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="17:10" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="12sp" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:strokeColor="#7700FF" app:strokeWidth="1dp" />
<!-- Row 2 --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_transmart_1945" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_columnWeight="1" android:layout_margin="4dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="19:45" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="12sp" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:strokeColor="#7700FF" app:strokeWidth="1dp" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_transmart_2030" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_columnWeight="1" android:layout_margin="4dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="20:30" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="12sp" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:strokeColor="#7700FF" app:strokeWidth="1dp" /> </GridLayout>
<!-- Beli Tiket Button --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_beli_tiket" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="56dp" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:backgroundTint="#7700FF" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="BELI TIKET" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="16sp" app:cornerRadius="30dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/grid_schedule_transmart" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout> </ScrollView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="#0D0F20" tools:context=".JadwalSpidermanActivity">
<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:paddingBottom="24dp">
<!-- Header Section --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/iv_back" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="16dp" android:contentDescription="@string/back_button" android:src="@drawable/ic_arrow_back" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:tint="@android:color/white" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_header_title" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_bold" android:text="BELI TIKET JADWAL OFF" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="18sp" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="@id/iv_back" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="@id/iv_back" />
<!-- Movie Info Card --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:id="@+id/cv_movie_info" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_margin="16dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="#1A1D2E" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="0dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/iv_back">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp">
<androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="80dp" android:layout_height="120dp" app:cardCornerRadius="8dp" app:cardElevation="0dp">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/iv_movie_poster" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:contentDescription="@string/movie_poster" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:src="@drawable/poster_spiderman" /> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical">
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_movie_title" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_bold" android:text="SPIDERMAN FAR FROM HOME" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="16sp" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" android:orientation="horizontal">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_regular" android:text="Usia" android:textColor="#9CA3AF" android:textSize="10sp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:background="@drawable/rating_background" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:paddingStart="8dp" android:paddingTop="2dp" android:paddingEnd="8dp" android:paddingBottom="2dp" android:text="R 13+" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="10sp" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:orientation="horizontal">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_regular" android:text="Rating" android:textColor="#9CA3AF" android:textSize="10sp" />
<ImageView android:layout_width="12dp" android:layout_height="12dp" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:contentDescription="@string/star_rating" android:src="@drawable/logo_bintang" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="4dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="9.5" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="10sp" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" android:orientation="horizontal">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_regular" android:text="Durasi" android:textColor="#9CA3AF" android:textSize="10sp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="8dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="2 Jam 9 Menit" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="10sp" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
<ImageView android:id="@+id/iv_watchlist" android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical" android:contentDescription="Watchlist" android:src="@drawable/ic_heart" app:tint="#7700FF" /> </LinearLayout> </androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Sinopsis Section --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tv_sinopsis_label" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_bold" android:text="SINOPSIS" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="14sp" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/cv_movie_info" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_sinopsis_jadwal" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="JADWAL" android:textColor="#7700FF" android:textSize="14sp" app:layout_constraintBaseline_toBaselineOf="@id/tv_sinopsis_label" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- CGV XXI CIREBON Section --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/ll_cgv_header" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:background="#1A1D2E" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="12dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/tv_sinopsis_label">
<ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical" android:contentDescription="Location" android:src="@drawable/ic_map_pin" app:tint="#7700FF" />
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="CGV XXI CIREBON" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="14sp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_regular" android:text="Rp.40.000" android:textColor="#7700FF" android:textSize="12sp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Date Picker Horizontal --> <HorizontalScrollView android:id="@+id/hsv_dates" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:scrollbars="none" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/ll_cgv_header">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal">
<!-- Rabu 19 Nov --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_date_1" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="80dp" android:layout_height="70dp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="RABU\n19 Nov" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="11sp" app:backgroundTint="#7700FF" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:strokeColor="#7700FF" app:strokeWidth="1dp" />
<!-- Kamis 20 Nov --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_date_2" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="80dp" android:layout_height="70dp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="KAMIS\n20 Nov" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="11sp" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:strokeColor="#7700FF" app:strokeWidth="1dp" />
<!-- Jumat 21 Nov --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_date_3" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="80dp" android:layout_height="70dp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="JUMAT\n21 Nov" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="11sp" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:strokeColor="#7700FF" app:strokeWidth="1dp" />
<!-- Sabtu 22 Nov --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_date_4" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="80dp" android:layout_height="70dp" android:layout_marginEnd="8dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="SABTU\n22 Nov" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="11sp" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:strokeColor="#7700FF" app:strokeWidth="1dp" />
<!-- Minggu 23 Nov --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_date_5" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="80dp" android:layout_height="70dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="MINGGU\n23 Nov" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="11sp" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:strokeColor="#7700FF" app:strokeWidth="1dp" /> </LinearLayout> </HorizontalScrollView>
<!-- Schedule Grid CGV --> <GridLayout android:id="@+id/grid_schedule_cgv" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:columnCount="3" android:rowCount="2" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/hsv_dates">
<!-- Row 1 --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_cgv_1245" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_columnWeight="1" android:layout_margin="4dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="12:45" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="12sp" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:strokeColor="#7700FF" app:strokeWidth="1dp" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_cgv_1430" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_columnWeight="1" android:layout_margin="4dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="14:30" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="12sp" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:strokeColor="#7700FF" app:strokeWidth="1dp" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_cgv_1615" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_columnWeight="1" android:layout_margin="4dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="16:15" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="12sp" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:strokeColor="#7700FF" app:strokeWidth="1dp" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_cgv_1800" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_columnWeight="1" android:layout_margin="4dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="18:00" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="12sp" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:strokeColor="#7700FF" app:strokeWidth="1dp" />
<!-- Row 2 --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_cgv_1945" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_columnWeight="1" android:layout_margin="4dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="19:45" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="12sp" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:strokeColor="#7700FF" app:strokeWidth="1dp" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_cgv_2030" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_columnWeight="1" android:layout_margin="4dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="20:30" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="12sp" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:strokeColor="#7700FF" app:strokeWidth="1dp" />
<!-- Empty space for alignment --> <Space android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_columnWeight="1" android:layout_margin="4dp" /> </GridLayout>
<!-- TRANSMART CIREBON CGV Section --> <LinearLayout android:id="@+id/ll_transmart_header" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:background="#1A1D2E" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="12dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/grid_schedule_cgv">
<ImageView android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical" android:contentDescription="Location" android:src="@drawable/ic_map_pin" app:tint="#7700FF" />
<TextView android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_marginStart="12dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="TRANSMART CIREBON CGV" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="14sp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="center_vertical" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_regular" android:text="Rp.45.000" android:textColor="#7700FF" android:textSize="12sp" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Additional Info Transmart --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tv_regular_2d" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="REGULER 2D-23L" android:textColor="#7700FF" android:textSize="12sp" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/ll_transmart_header" />
<!-- Schedule Grid Transmart --> <GridLayout android:id="@+id/grid_schedule_transmart" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:columnCount="3" android:rowCount="2" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/tv_regular_2d">

<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_transmart_1710" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_columnWeight="1" android:layout_margin="4dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="17:10" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="12sp" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:strokeColor="#7700FF" app:strokeWidth="1dp" />
<!-- Row 2 --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_transmart_1945" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_columnWeight="1" android:layout_margin="4dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="19:45" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="12sp" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:strokeColor="#7700FF" app:strokeWidth="1dp" />
<com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_transmart_2030" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_columnWeight="1" android:layout_margin="4dp" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="20:30" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="12sp" app:cornerRadius="8dp" app:strokeColor="#7700FF" app:strokeWidth="1dp" />
<!-- Empty space for alignment --> <Space android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_columnWeight="1" android:layout_margin="4dp" /> </GridLayout>
<!-- Beli Tiket Button --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_beli_tiket" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="56dp" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:backgroundTint="#7700FF" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins_semibold" android:text="BELI TIKET" android:textAllCaps="false" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="16sp" app:cornerRadius="30dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/grid_schedule_transmart" />
</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout> </ScrollView>
